attributes.action: Raise or put in place the minimum jail sentence for online grooming offences
attributes.additional_details: We aim to get well over 100000 signatures and have the minimum jail term of online grooming offences to be discussed in court as we feel that this needs serious action to prevent and Save the Children of this country we are a voluntary group for the children's pride we are the voice of absolutely millions when we say that this needs to be looked at and more severe punishment needs to be given
attributes.background: The children's pride a  online awareness and hunting group  designed to help those victims and also bring people to Justice To raise the minimum jail term or to raise the minimum jail term for anyone convicted of child grooming offences

rejection.details:
We're not exactly sure what you mean by "raise or put in place the minimum sentence." The offence of sexual communication with a child (which could include online grooming) currently has a maximum sentence of 2 years, and no minimum sentence. You can find out more here: 

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/circular-201701-sexual-communication-with-a-child-implementation-of-s67-of-the-serious-crime-act-2015

You could start a new petition asking the UK Government and Parliament to introduce a specific minimum sentence and raise the maximum sentence, if that's what you want to happen.
